metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13316 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was discovered in GitLab versions before 13.1.10, 13.2.8and 13.3.4. GitLab was not validating a Deploy-Token and allowed a disabledrepository be accessible via a git command line.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
